entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
